title: "Linear Regression"
output: html_document
date: "2023-04-22"
---


```{r}
htwt<-read.csv("../data/htwt.csv")
summary(htwt)
htwt$female <- ifelse(htwt$SEX=='f',1,0)
htwt$fem_age <- htwt$AGE * htwt$female
regression<-lm(HEIGHT~female+AGE+fem_age, data=htwt, AGE<=19)
summary(regression)
```
